# Tracking Your Repair {#tracking-your-repair .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

Tracking Your Repair

If you ever need to see the status of your repair, please use the Repair
Tracking tool on our website:
<https://www.digitaldreamlabs.com/pages/repair-tracker>

Place your RMA number (in the format \"T-\<*number\>*\"), as in this
example: **T-287**

::: {.articleRatings article-url="https://support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/522-tracking-your-repair"}
